hero.headline: Gift guide
hero.tagline: Discover our hand-picked gift ideas for all kinds of activities, budgets and adventures.

promos.text: Winter warmth starts with the clothing layer next to your skin.
Stand your ground in insulated layers from cutting-edge brands.
The right gear for warm sleeps and waking to the magic of year-round camping.
Boots, snowshoes and warm layers are all you need to start exploring.
